text: Soft, transparent lace for a seamless melt & natural-looking hairline —≤ One-size Cap Fit with adjustable bands for circumference fit üíØ ReXI‚Ñ¢ Lab-Made Hair. This unit offers juicy glamorous curls that hold their shape, can be styled fuller when you unravel the curls. The Dream Girl wig features a T-Frontal lace cap for a natural hairline and maximum comfort. Available in colors 1B Black and Natural color. ‚ú® This style is also commonly known as Loose Curls T-Lace Wig. Model in first picture is wearing Dream Girl in 24 inches, 1b black. text: notes on shipping and tracking info We offer same-day shipments in Lagos only. Cut-off time is 3PM for items to ship same-day, else they ship next-day. Delivery within Lagos takes 1 working day after it's shipped out. All shipments outside Lagos are done via express or standard shipping. text: hair, ReXI‚Ñ¢ is heat-resistant, so you can use your heat styling tools‚Äîalways follow recommended heat settings( ReXI‚Ñ¢ takes heat upto 210/390F, we recommend using a heat protectant always for heat styling) Will my ReXI‚Ñ¢ style tangle? ReXI‚Ñ¢ fibres are engineered to resist tangling and frizz, so your styles stay resistant to tangles with minimal upkeep. We recommend our Preserve Mist to preserve strand integrity , help with detangling, protection from frizz effect and matting. Can the hair be washed or reused? Absolutely. Our hair can be washed gently with mild shampoo and reused multiple times without losing its softness or sheen ( we recommend conditioning/moisturizing / hydrating shampoos) Is ReXI‚Ñ¢ hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive scalps? Yes. ReXI‚Ñ¢ fibres are lab-treated to be bacteria-resistant, skin-friendly, and developed hypoallergenic, making them suitable for sensitive skin and scalp. What‚Äôs the best way to maintain my style? Good storage, good combing/brushing techniques and great maintenance products.
